title: finetune model forward error
body_html:
I hava finetune the Nasnetalager model from imagenet,change the liner layer to 30
but when I forward the forward model ,the output is 1000
print(self.linear)
x = self.linear(x)
print(x)

Linear(in_features=4032, out_features=30)
Variable containing:
-0.3304 0.5077 1.0844 ... -0.2731 0.0184 -0.2642
[torch.cuda.FloatTensor of size 1x1000 (GPU 0)]

why?
